channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This sign appears simply to have been left. I don't believe it relates to any current diversion., 3rd November
item.description:
204 High St Cheltenham GL50 3HD.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 204, High Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Huge pothole, 3rd November
item.description:
Just before Blaisdon Way,nearly opposite the allotments
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged roundabout sign, 3rd November
item.description:
Damaged roundabout sign. It has been knocked down by a vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 3rd November
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure please lift and relay x1 rocking sunken 400x400x20mm slab number 1 (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 3rd November
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure required abrupt level different please lift and and replacex1 broken 600x450x20mm (FW Broken Slabs)
